entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI First Round 2002. Voting preferences of the adult population before the first round of the 2002 Hungarian Parliamentary elections.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-F30: TÁRKI First Round 2002. Voting preferences of the adult population before the first round of the 2002 Hungarian Parliamentary elections.. data sheet. Version: 2007-01-19
entry.dcterms:creator: Gazsó, Tibor
Kolosi, Tamás
Tóth, István György
entry.dcterms:description: party preferences, voting behavior, voting intentions, evaluation of Prime Minister candidates
entry.dcterms:subject: mass political behavior, attitudes
political institutions, public administration
person
survey data
cross-section

Multi-stage stratified probability random sample. At the first stage settlement and county strata were prepared. At the second stage a starting point was chosen for the random walking in the selected settlement, then every fourth household was visited. That person was selected who usually spends the least amount of time at home. The data collection is made up of two (a 10000 and a 5000-person) samples which are representative in themselves too.
face-to-face interview
D (after 2007-05-01: A)
